title: Black eye
creator_credit: Jack Arnold, Pat Rooney and Pat Rooney Production
brief_description: Since being forced to give up his police badge following a suspension from duties, Shep Stone (Fred Williamson) has tried his hand at P.I work. Arriving home to his apartment one evening Stone finds a murder victim, and a killer waiting. Cast includes Fred Williamson, Rosemary Forsyth, Teresa Graves and Floy Dean. Based on the novel “Murder on the wild side” by Jeff Jacks.
